issues.title: Inconsistent Pricing Display
issues.description: Some products display a strikethrough price and a discounted price (e.g., BLUE HOODIE, FALL COAT, DENIM COAT, PROFESSIONAL SUIT), while others only show a single price. This inconsistency is visually jarring.
issues.why_fix: Inconsistent presentation of pricing can confuse users and make it difficult to quickly compare product values.
issues.how_to_fix: Ensure all products either consistently display both original and discounted prices (if a discount applies) or only the current price. If there is no discount, show only the regular price without strikethrough.

issues.title: Inconsistent 'Add to Cart' vs. 'Select Options'
issues.description: Most products have an 'ADD TO CART' button, while some (FALL COAT, DENIM COAT, PROFESSIONAL SUIT) have a 'Select Options' button. This suggests these latter products may have variations (size, color, etc.) that need to be selected before adding to the cart.
issues.why_fix: The inconsistency in button labels suggests a variation in product types and may confuse users. It's important to clearly indicate when options need to be selected before adding to the cart.
issues.how_to_fix: Standardize the button label based on whether product options are required. If options are required, 'Select Options' is appropriate. If not, 'Add to Cart' should be used.

issues.title: Products with 'Login for Pricing'
issues.description: One product, 'DARK BLUE DENIM JEANS', displays 'Login for Pricing' instead of a price. This is unexpected in a general product listing.
issues.why_fix: Hiding the price behind a login wall creates a poor user experience. Users are less likely to engage with a product if they can't see the price immediately.
issues.how_to_fix: Determine if this product should be visible to all users or only logged-in users. If it's meant to be visible to all, ensure a price is displayed. If it is only for logged in users, make that clear and provide a clear call to action to log in.

issues.title: Cookie Policy Notice
issues.description: The cookie policy notice at the top is very basic and lacks styling. It could be improved to be more visually appealing and user-friendly.
issues.why_fix: A better-designed cookie notice improves the user experience and can increase compliance with privacy regulations.
issues.how_to_fix: Add styling to the cookie notice to make it more visually appealing and integrate it better with the site's design. Consider using a more prominent banner or a pop-up.
